column1: Section:FIN-Budgetary Control, Inquiry and Reporting (38 Reqs)

column4: Provide the ability to report on all detailed data for up to 10 years to meet legislative and management reporting needs both on a  standard and ad-hoc reporting basis.
Provide ability to summarize individual line-item accounts into meaningful groups of accounts for use in financial reporting, based  on user-defined criteria.
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Fund Structure.
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Agency/Department.

Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Organization Structure (e.g., Agency, Division,
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Program Structure.

Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Appropriation Structure (currently Fund, Fiscal Year, Organization and  Activity).
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Location.
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Project Structure.

Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Expenditure / Revenue Sub-Object Structure.

Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Balance Sheet Account.
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Grant Structure.
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Activity.
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Function.
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Budget Year.

Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Period (Fiscal Month/Fiscal Year or Fiscal Year).

Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Other Reporting Period (e.g.. Calendar Month/Year, Federal Month/Year).
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: GAAP Fund.
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Funding Source.
Provide ability to report budget, encumbrances, commitments, actual revenues, and actual expenditures by user-defined period  using any of the following Chart of Account elements: Cost Center.
System can produce ad-hoc reports using any field in the General Ledger.
Maintain a history of all General Ledger transactions and produces detailed transaction reports to provide an appropriate audit  trail.

Provide ability to show different organizational structures on a single report displaying accurate prior and current year data.  Within the report, a unit existing under one division in the prior year may be reflected under a new division or may not exist in the  current year.
Provide ability to filter, search, and report month-to-date and year-to-date budget, estimated revenue, expenditures, revenue,  encumbrances, and commitments by any element in the Chart of Accounts.
Display names for all Chart of Accounts data included when producing reports.
Provide ability to view reports online and print them.
Provide ability to upload and download information from/to spreadsheet (Excel, Lotus) and database (Access) formats to the  system.
Provide ability to have ad hoc and standard reports.
Provide ability to have data accessible in a reporting server.
Provide ability to create management reports every month.

Provide ability to search transactions online in real-time by various chart of accounts elements and transaction type number (e.g.,  voucher number, purchase requisition number, purchase order number, etc.).
Provide ability to produce report supporting budget preparation/creation.
Provide ability to produce a report that provides the beginning and ending balance for the year.
Provide ability to report expenditures on user-defined time periods (e.g., YTD, fiscal year, calendar year, grant year, project year,  etc.).
Provide ability to view/report on detailed voucher information.
Provide ability to provide on-line drill down of transaction.
Provide ability to see obligations (encumbrances) by purchase order number or Chart of Accounts value or range of values.
Provide ability to produce an appropriation status report that reflects encumbrances as well as expenditures.
